basics.name: Kenneth de Guzman
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they earn a grade point of average of 3.50 or higher during a semester.

awards.title: Academic Honors, Summa Cum Laude
awards.summary: Honors Recognition Certificate awarded to students who achieved the requirements for a High School diploma with a cumulative GPA of 3.80 or higher.

awards.title: Hawai'i Nikkei Historical Editorial Board
awards.summary: Awarded to students during the 2017 Hawai'i History Day State Fair with a theme of 'Taking a Stand' for outstanding projects in research. My paper detailed the life of Frederick Douglass and his pivotal role with the Abolitionist Movement.
